Title: A Little Late to Grow a Pair
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Liz Sagal, Liz Sagal (supervising story producer)
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Proctor takes his anger out on the Amish. Watts has plans to take the Brotherhood in a direction that angers Calvin. Dawson and Hood roust an S&M club. Cruz starts to suspect Carrie as the vigilante. Lotus publicly calls out the killer.
